text: The skeleton of the boat will now take shape, and this is the time to check before making fast to see that nothing is distorted. Ensure that the outside measurements horizontally. Next bevel the chines with a plane so that the bottom will fit snugly.
handwritten_text: The skeleton of the boat will now take shape, and this is the time to check before making fast to see that nothing is distorted. Ensure that the outside measurements horizontally. Next bevel the chines with a plane so that the bottom will fit snugly.
